name: Kerblooey
description:
A casual strategy board game. Obliterate your opponent using the exploding power of atomic crystals.
The experience of unleashing a massive chain reaction on your opponent has to be seen to be believed! And just listen to that satisfying, popping sound!

Each player takes a turn to place a crystal but each tile can only hold so many before it explodes, sending its crystals into the adjacent tiles and claiming them for you:
corner tile = 1 crystal
side tile = 2 crystals
middle tile = 3 crystals

When only your crystals remain on the board you get the sweet, sweet taste of victory.

Play against a friend or against the CPU

Need a quick game? No problem - adjust the board size to suit your time requirements
